TITLE: Gramercy Funds CIO on emerging markets investing amid the Russia war, including Ukrainian bonds
SUMMARY: Robert Koenigsberger, CIO of Gramercy Funds, discussed his investment in Ukrainian bonds.

TITLE: Hedge funds are doubling down on commodities bets with some notching big gains
SUMMARY: Hedge funds have ramped up their commodity bets as prices surged during geopolitical turmoil, and managers with big exposure are reaping sizable profits.

TITLE: Warren Buffett scoops up another $1 billion in Occidental shares, bringing total stake to $7 billion
SUMMARY: Berkshire Hathaway purchased an additional 18.1 million shares of Occidental Petroleum for almost $1 billion on the first three days of this week.

TITLE: New Federal Reserve projections show six more rate hikes this year
SUMMARY: The Federal Reserve released its updated dot plot and latest projections for economic growth and inflation on Wednesday.

TITLE: JPMorgan rolls back Covid precautions including masking and mandatory testing as U.S. cases drop
SUMMARY: Two years after sending employees home en masse in the early days of the pandemic, corporations are preparing for the return to office life.

TITLE: U.S.- listed China shares are tumbling again with Alibaba down 9%
SUMMARY: Shares of Chinese stocks listed in the U.S. tumbled Monday as investors reassess their positions amid renewed delisting fears

SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, like Tesla & CrowdStrike

TITLE: Warren Buffett is still buying Occidental Petroleum, adding shares worth $1.5 billion
SUMMARY: Buffett spent more than $1.5 billion this week to add another 27.1 million shares to Berkshire Hathaway's stake.

TITLE: Ackman’s Pershing Square is back at Canadian Pacific. This is what could be ahead for the railroad
SUMMARY: Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square recently announced a new position in Canadian Pacific, a company the hedge fund helped overhaul years ago.

TITLE: Insiders debate how to secure America's future energy needs at the industry's biggest gathering
SUMMARY: Energy industry executives gathered in Houston at a pivotal time, as Russia's war on Ukraine brings energy security and the shift to renewables to the fore.

TITLE: Deutsche Bank reverses course on Russia, says it is unwinding business there after Ukraine invasion
SUMMARY: Financial institutions continue to exit Russia in the third week of its Ukraine invasion.

TITLE: More women in the boardroom could drive higher credit ratings and stock returns for firms — they still hold just 29% of seats
SUMMARY: About a third of corporate board seats are now held by women, and gender diversity in boardrooms could lead to higher credit ratings and stock performance.

TITLE: JPMorgan says labor shortage requires unconventional hiring, including people with criminal records
SUMMARY: Companies can deal with global labor shortages in part by tapping the neurodiverse and people with criminal backgrounds, JPMorgan says.

TITLE: Chinese stocks are down sharply on Thursday. Here’s what could be behind the decline
SUMMARY: A 2020 law called the Holding Foreign Companies Accountable Act may be behind the sharp decline in a handful of U.S-traded Chinese stocks.

TITLE: SEC to vote on new cybersecurity disclosure rules as Ukraine crisis gives them ‘special relevance’
SUMMARY: Cybersecurity is only a small part of the ambitious regulatory agenda SEC Chair Gary Gensler has laid out.

TITLE: Investing app Acorns taps 'choppy' private markets at $1.9 billion valuation after scrapping SPAC
SUMMARY: The move shows that ample funding is still available for late-stage start-ups with good prospects

TITLE: Oil producers in a 'dire situation' and unable to ramp up output, says Oxy CEO
SUMMARY: Oxy CEO Vicki Hollub said U.S. oil output can't just be ramped up quickly to meet new demand.

TITLE: Closing the gender gap for women-led businesses could boost global GDP by $2 trillion, Citi says
SUMMARY: Women receive a small fraction of VC funding and closing the investment gender gap could drive economic growth, according to a new report from Citigroup.

TITLE: Cathie Wood says she still expects to see 'spectacular returns' over the next 5 years
SUMMARY: "Given our expectations for growth in these new technologies, I think we're going to see some spectacular returns," the Ark Invest CEO told CNBC's "Capital Connection."

SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, like Apple and Airbnb.

TITLE: Starboard Value has options to build value at webchat provider LivePerson
SUMMARY: Starboard Value recently sent a letter to webchat provider LivePerson, nominating four candidates for the company’s board of directors.

SUMMARY: Exchange-traded funds that track Russian stocks have lost over half of their value this week, and some have been halted from trading entirely.

TITLE: For Warren Buffett, Apple is his new Cola-Cola as the investing icon reaps $100 billion in six years
SUMMARY: Warren Buffett's recent success from his massive Apple bet is spurring comparisons with the legend's greatest investment of all time — Coca-Cola.

TITLE: Tech private equity investor Orlando Bravo says the mantra of 'growth at all costs' is over
SUMMARY: Orlando Bravo says the mantra of 'growth at all costs' is over and investors are slowly shifting their focus from momentum to fundamentals and profitability.

SUMMARY: Fraser, who started as CEO of Citigroup a year ago, held her inaugural investor conference on Wednesday.

TITLE: Traders fret about a growth slowdown as Fed Chair Powell faces a dilemma on rates
SUMMARY: War in Ukraine may slow down growth, but it also stokes inflation. The Federal Reserve must weigh these factors.

TITLE: Energy giant Shell to end partnership with Russia's Gazprom as Ukraine conflict intensifies
SUMMARY: Shell said Monday it is ending an "equity partnership" with Gazprom, a Russian state-owned energy company, as the Russia-Ukraine conflict continues.

TITLE: Moscow’s stock market is closed, but these Russian ETFs continue to trade in the U.S. Here’s why
SUMMARY: The Russian stock market in Moscow is closed, but U.S.-based Russian ETFs are still trading stateside.

TITLE: Secret JPMorgan project aims to push bank deeper into growing market serving private companies
SUMMARY: CEO Jamie Dimon is aggressively investing to help his bank battle fintech firms.

TITLE: Shipping giant Maersk considers suspension of all deliveries to and from Russia
SUMMARY: "Our preparations include a possible suspension of Maersk bookings to and from Russia on ocean and inland," Marsek said on Monday.
